12:00 AM

Pond Farm Artist in Residence Open Call to Artist - through
Monday February 02 - 12:00 AM to 11:59 PM

Sebastopol Center For The Arts

Wayne Thiebaud's lushly painted still life's of cakes, pies, and gumball machines are icons of modern American Art.
